text:
Getty

Selena Gomez showed up to the American Music Awards red carpet saying, "New look, who dis?"

The "Wolves" singer debuted a platinum blonde hairstyle on Sunday night, pairing the look with a rocking black leather mini dress, and fans on Twitter have a lot of opinions.

Gomez will perform for the first time in over a year during the award show, her first performance since her kidney transplant earlier this year.

While most fans agree that she looks hotter than ever, the look has also drawn comparisons to on-again boyfriend Justin Bieber. Here's what they're saying so far:

Blonde Selena Gomez is something I can't live without now @selenagomez #SELENAxAMAs #SelenaXCoach pic.twitter.com/ZJS8jv1OjC @anettx89

omfg Selena Gomez is blonde!!! 👀👀 @kasiaiam

Wait, that blonde girl in leather dress was Selena Gomez? #AMAs @bts_bewitched

Selena Gomez is blonde and is wearing a leather jacket which reminds me #AMAs pic.twitter.com/6ae5oa4v3Q @MelanieSargsian

@selenagomez at the #amas omg you look beautifull i am #shooketh❤ 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥 i am not okay wow pic.twitter.com/efjkBHOOCx @lienni23

Selena Gomez in a blonde wig! 😍😍😍😍😍😍😍 @99DoubleB

It's a no 😞blonde ages her! @lushonmars

SELENA GOMEZ IS BLONDE NOW!!! @longliveswift16

selena gomez blonde hair? i am here today because i am gay @donghyeezus

🚨 @selenagomez in a bombshell leather dress and with BLONDE HAIR! Rock IT! #AMAs #TVStyleExpert #FashionStylist pic.twitter.com/qIMrMY4PDV @StylistMichelle

@selenagomez DYED HER HAIR BLONDE 😍 @Heatherr_Conway

Not gonna lie , Selena Gomez lowkey looks hot as a blonde @yourgirlbeann

wait selena gomez is blonde???? @_beenwavey

SELENA GOMEZ WENT BLOND @okkentweets

SELENA GOMEZ IS BLONDE, MY GOD, IM SHOOK 🔥😍. #SelenaxAMAs #AMAs. pic.twitter.com/oZZtWWCYPC @LifeWithSelG

I could NOT be more obsessed with @selenagomez 😍😍😍😍 #AMAs pic.twitter.com/ZgS8u8Q0ZS @kinseyschofield

YOOOO SELENA GOMEZ LOOKS SO GOOD AS A BLONDE, I'M SHOOK #AMAs pic.twitter.com/Idez2ladi9 @AbbigailSinger1

We are LOVING your new look! 💁🏼‍♀️ @selenagomez #SelenaxAMAs pic.twitter.com/zeiyzACu3p @GomezSource

Selena Gomez is BLONDE! I repeat. SELENA GOMEZ IS BLONDE. And looks FAB. #AMAs pic.twitter.com/anboqr58xp @Katie_Krause

SELENA GOMEZ LITERALLY WORE A BLACK WIG TODAY SO SHE COULD KEEP HER HAIR A SURPRISE. IM SCREAMING. pic.twitter.com/6IXI9SEGTP @ohsodua

I feel personally offended by how amazing Selena Gomez looks with blonde hair. #AMAs pic.twitter.com/ljPobF544t @amyastrid

Selena Gomez looks so beautiful in blonde 😍 #AMAs pic.twitter.com/FBVlzWDj7Q @FIirtationship
title: Selena Gomez Debuted A New Look on the AMA Red Carpet and Fans Are 'Shook'
